definitions.definition: A standard by which something is evaluated or measured .
A surveyor 's mark made on some stationary object and shown on a map ; used as a reference point .
A computer program that is executed to assess the performance of the runtime environment.

main_definition: A standard by which something is evaluated or measured .
secondary_definitions: A surveyor 's mark made on some stationary object and shown on a map ; used as a reference point .
( computing ) A computer program that is executed to assess the performance of the runtime environment.
